``add_integer`` module
===================

Using ``add``
-------------

We first import ``add`` from the ``add_integer`` module:

   >>> add_integer =  __import__('0-add_integer').add_integer

Using the module:

   Adding two numbers
   ------------------
   >>> add_integer(2, 3)
   5

   Adding two big numbers
   ______________________
   >>> add_integer(, )
